catalogue_raissonne: Upper image: New Hollstein 299 (Hollar); Lower image: New Hollstein 603 (Hollar)
description: top image: woman, full length facing right looking at viewer; ribbon in hair; pearl neclace and earrings; low cut bodice with lace collar and jeweled brooch; fur muff in right hand lower image: woman wearing striped coat walking to right with back to viewer; striped coat with braid around hem and sleeves; holding fan
dimension:
5 3/8 × 3 in. (13.65 × 7.62 cm) (image, sheet, upper image)
3 11/16 × 2 1/4 in. (9.37 × 5.72 cm) (image, sheet, lower Image)
11 7/8 × 9 in. (30.16 × 22.86 cm) (mount)
inscription:
Signature, Title Date, and Inscription

Lower image: in image in black: [Ein Spanische Dama/ Hollar fecit 1649/ Mulier Nobilis Hispanica]; on sheet in pencil: [1-551]; on verso in pencil: [122]

On mount in pencil: [Hollar]
portfolio:

Lower image: Mulier Nobilis Hispanica
title: Ein Spanische Dama (lower image)
